comments.body: Why not name this to jquery-notify to match the github name even though it's not on npm?

I just based on its file name - `jquery.notify.js`.
Also I can see that there are more names like "jquery." than "jquery-" in the repo. 
But I can change if you think it should be with hyphen.
Probably doesn't matter too much since it's unlikely to be added to npm.
